comments.author: joinfree
comments.body: Interesting to see these folks combining too huge tech to build their products. Diversified Proof of stake, Zero Knowlege and AI is the new trend at the moment. I am looking forward to how this will definitely pan out. just a few questions that i have at the moment. Has the team been building in stealth all this while or they just decide to roll out plans since AI and ZK hype is peak at the moment. Security is important so it will be best to get this really in place first before launch. My two cents!

Gopman has helped grow 2 Web3 unicorns (Ankr Network+Kadena Protocol) and co-founded Akash Network."https://twitter.com/tenet_org/status/1640380186276294656

comments.author: FrozenBit
comments.body: It seems that the AI ​​field is slowly gaining momentum in the crypto space, some developers are seeing a huge opportunity to introduce their technology to the market. While not sure how complete and applicable the product is, I think this is a project to look forward to.Probably the first impression I'm seeing is that the demo product looks pretty good.

comments.body: Quote from: SosSpagetti on April 03, 2023, 04:23:18 PMMeet Eva: https://twitter.com/tenet_org/status/1642913420965031938?s=20thanks for sharing"Eva is built on proprietary AI models that turn text or voice commands to on-chain actions"I am pretty surprised with all AI powered apps and services I have seen already, like articles writer, seo specialist, image/video creation using simple words as description, and so on.This gives a lot of hope when it comes to EVA, that it can help to make wallets more secure and easy to use.
